import React from "react"; import { useState } from "react"; function LoginUser() { let user = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("user-info")); const [username, setUsername] = useState(""); const [password, setPassword] = useState(""); async function ulogin() { //const ulogin = () => { //console.log("hola estoy en login") //console.warn(username, password) /*APIUser.AutenticaUser({username, password}) //.then(response => console.log(JSON.parse(response))) .then((response) => JSON.stringify(response)) .catch(error => console.log(error)) if (username){ console.log("lleguÃ© aqui") return history.push('/gestionar') }*/ let item = { username, password }; let result = await fetch(`http://localhost:5000/login`, { method: "POST", headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json", Accept: "application/json", }, body: JSON.stringify(item), }); result = await result.json(); localStorage.setItem("user-info", JSON.stringify(result)); if (user && user.name) { localStorage.clear(); window.location.href = "/gestionar"; } } const uClose = () => { console.log("hola estoy en login y quiero cerrar"); }; return ( <> {/* small modal */}
